description: Get detailed data for a service instance. A service instance is an instantiation of service template and it runs in a specific environment.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of a service instance that you want to get the detailed data for.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service that you want the service instance input for.

nested_items.name: serviceInstance
nested_items.description: The detailed data of the requested service instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service instance.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the service instance was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The message associated with the service instance deployment status.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment that the service instance was deployed into.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment of this service instance.

nested_items.name: lastClientRequestToken
nested_items.description: The last client request token received.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentAttemptedAt
nested_items.description: The time when a deployment of the service instance was last attempted.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentSucceededAt
nested_items.description: The time when the service instance was last deployed successfully.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment of this service instance.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service that the service instance belongs to.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The service spec that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the service template that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the service template that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template that was used to create the service instance.
